rooms.description: Large entrance hall that opens directly into the garden for a bright and welcoming atmosphere. Vastu suggests positioning the door facing east for positive energy.

Spacious living area that doubles as dining space with large windows and sliding doors leading to a pergola-covered garden. The room is designed to have a south or east exposure according to Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen with ample storage and ventilation. It is located in the south-west quadrant as per Vastu for prosperity.
Compact bathroom adjacent to the living area, with considerations for sound insulation and proper ventilation. Placed in a corner away from the main entrance as recommended by Vastu.

openings.description: Large front door with glass accents to welcome natural light.
Access to a covered garden area, aligning with Mediterranean aesthetics and promoting an indoor-outdoor flow.
Door leading to the garden patio, designed for evening relaxation.

vastu_considerations.details: Main entrance faces east ensuring auspicious entry and natural light.
Living and dining areas are oriented towards south or east, maximizing sunlight during the day.

garden_details.description: A large garden with Mediterranean elements such as olive trees and stone paths integrated into the design.
